Class Translation

Namespace
Instaclause.Domain.Translations
Assembly
Instaclause.Domain.dll

Represents a translation of content within the system, facilitating multilingual support for documents, questions, and other textual content.

Gets a value indicating whether the translation has been approved for use, ensuring quality and accuracy of translated content.

Gets the identifier for the translation.

Result

Gets the result of the translation, containing the translated text in the target language.

public required string Result { get; init; }

string

SourceLanguage

Gets the source language of the translation, linking to the Language entity that represents the language from which the content was translated.

public Language? SourceLanguage { get; init; }

Gets the source language identifier, indicating the original language of the text.

Gets the text to be translated, serving as the source content for the translation process.

Uses

Gets the number of times this translation has been used, providing insights into the relevance and utility of specific translations within the system.
